scripts.release: rm dist -rf; rm docs -rf; mkdir dist; cp index.html dist; webpack --config ./webpack_browser.config.js; mv dist docs; echo www.aikaruta.rheikai.com > docs/CNAME;
scripts.nodejs: rm dist -rf; rm nodejs -rf; webpack --config ./webpack_nodejs.config.js; mv dist nodejs;
scripts.watch: rm dist -rf; mkdir dist; cp index.html dist; webpack-dev-server --config ./webpack_browser.config.js;
